article: What is a library for ? Most libraries have books and other things to read . Many of them have things to listen to . Some libraries even have computers . Very few people would think of a library as a place to live in . One library in New York City turned into a home for 250 people for a few days . These were all people near the library . They slept on the floor . Why did the people move into the library ? The people moved into the library because the city wanted to close it to save money . These 250 New Yorkers loved their library . They did n ' t want to lose it . So they moved in . They knew that the library could n ' t be closed if they were living inside it . At last the city agreed to keep the library open , and the people all went home .
